bwwExcerpt: Performances, though, are strong. Bowman brings bundles of energy and precision to the part of Elle, capturing her idealism and naive likeability. Nadine Higgin is the backbone of the show and one of its strongest singers in the role of Elle's rock and friend Paulette. Vanessa Fisher bristles with snooty poise as Elle's antagonist Vivienne, and Michael Ahomka-Lindsay commandeers the stage as the loveable Emmett. Legally Blonde the Musical has a self-selecting au
